tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had experiences with many dentists before and was looking for a good dentist after moving to Mumbai in 2016. I reached out to Dr. Pal because she came highly recommended. My subsequent experience with her work supports this feedback. She help me fixed an existing crown that had come off and with a couple of dental fillings. I felt that Dr. Pal was up-to-date on recent advances in the field of dental medicine and was able to give me several alternatives - including the most economical one, which was to try to fix my existing crown rather than going for a new expensive one. I was happy that she took the time to evaluate all my options and offer me the choices.  It has been about four months since my last visit to her office and I have been satisfied with all the dental work that she did. I will definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a good dentist. It also helps that her office is conveniently located very close to the Metro Stations at Marol Naka.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Shalini  Pal was able to finish off the work that my previous dentist  took months for and still left  incomplete in just 15 minutes!  She goes out of her way to ensure that the treatment is completed in good time. *** ** **** ******* *** *** **** ** ******** *** ********. I never had any instance of returning to Dr Shalini  to fix a  shoddy job. She is punctual and sticks to the appointment time. She explains the procedure well, keeps you  informed of options available and their pros and cons. She is careful while doing the procedures, very conscious about pain and tries her level best to make it comfortable for the patient. Very friendly and can put the patient at ease  ...highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have nothing but positive things to say about Dr Pal. She is extremely pleasant and professional, and explained the entire procedure before starting and even during the treatment. Her dental clinic is clean, hygienic and comfortable. She adhered to the appointment time and didnt have me waiting. I have had my bad share of experiences with chain dental clinics, so Dr Pal's treatment truly came as a relief. Also she took great effort to minimize pain and discomfort and surprisingly even after 2 weeks, there is no pain. I would highly recommend her to anyone I know.
reply_text: Thank u sushant . Words of encouragement helps us to excel more . Thank u

review:
Dr Shalani has been treating me from 2012 till date. 
*** *** ********* ****** *** *** ********** She has a very gentle hand and gives the best products which are very long lasting. 
Her prices are affordable and flexible.
She is very accommodating with appointments on an incident I had arrived from UK and had severe teeth pain at 9 pm she accommodated me to receive my pain. 
She is very polite and punctual.
I see Her more as my family than a doctor.

review: I have been going to dentists since childhood. Iv been through it all, root canals, braces, implants at a very young age. I have been experiencing lesser dental problem only since iv been visiting Dr. Shalini Pal (since 6 years). I travel all the way from Dadar to Marol to her clinic just because I want that high level of expertise. She not only treated my dental problems but also help me prevent them with the right treatments. When I had a tough time with my son not wanting to brush his teeth she even recommended some foods that act as natural cleansers for your teeth. Highly recommend her for adults, seniors & kids as well. Ill b taking my son to her as well for regular check ups.
